mapper.select: SELECT bsp.id AS productId, bsp.product_name AS productName, p.id as productTemplateId, bsp.image, bsp.sell_price AS price, p.unit_id AS unitId, p.unit_name AS unitName FROM dj_basics_storefront_product bsp, dj_basics_product_template p WHERE bsp.prod_template_id = p.id AND bsp.city_id = #{cityId}
